name: Buffer Bomber
description:
Buffer Bomber is a SHMUP where you can not shoot. In order to succeed in this frantic action game you must use your ships trusts shield to reflect the inbound enemy projectiles back.

This game was made in 48 Hours GMTK Jam 2018 by Jacob Lawson (Flapperultra)

Controls- Use the arrow keys to move around, W to rotate the shield anti-clockwise and S to rotate the shield clockwise.

Thank you for playing and enjoy!
